header.description:
This addon sends the name of the biome you are to the action bar.  
You can also use a feather on a block or an entity to get its biome in chat.   
Feel free to use the getBiome feature in own addons but credit me §s@Yasser444§r.  

Type this command to disable the biome detector:
   §b/scriptevent biome:read false§r   
Type this command to activate it again:
   §b/scriptevent biome:read true§r
header.name: Biome Detector
